body:
All my other AMAs fail, so HOPEFULLY some people (moar than 1) will ask me some questions.

Ask as many as possible, I am bored.
body_tagged:

title: HoboMaddy AMA

replies.body:
Your a very nice person.
do u like to wear a hood?
replies.body_tagged:
Your a very nice person.
do u like to wear a hood?

replies.body:
I am sorry about your failures hobo :c
anyway,
1. Are you an actual Hobo?
2. Is your real name Maddy?
3. Waffles or Pancakes?
4. Do you prefer comical singing or serious singing?
5. Would you rather have everything be your fault, or have everyone THINK everything was your fault? (this may or may not be a clever way of telling if your meen or not :0)
replies.body_tagged:
I am sorry about your failures hobo :c
anyway,
1. Are you an actual Hobo?
2. Is your real name Maddy?
3. Waffles or Pancakes?
4. Do you prefer comical singing or serious singing?
5. Would you rather have everything be your fault, or have everyone THINK everything was your fault? (this may or may not be a clever way of telling if your meen or not :0)

replies.body:
@BelgiumWaffles
"do u like to wear a hood?"
Hoods are awesome :D
@Storm997
"1. Are you an actual Hobo?" Maybe...
"2. Is your real name Maddy?" Yea
"3. Waffles or Pancakes?" Pancakes for life :D
"4. Do you prefer comical singing or serious singing?" Comical is better
"5. Would you rather have everything be your fault, or have everyone THINK everything was your fault? (this may or may not be a clever way of telling if your meen or not :0)" Everything not be my fault, because I suck at apologizing (shy person here) and use sarcasm a lot, so people would think I am being sarcastic anyways.
@AdrianG503
"Am I pretty?"
Yes, everyone is pretty! :)
